details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.2 logical structure - 8.2.5.26 Table - Headers, IDs and Scope
details.description: When a table contains header cells, that table shall provide sufficient semantic information to allow accurate determination of which of its table header cells (structure element TH) pertain to other cells as specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.8.5.7
